plot: Outer space in 2034 is run by greedy corporations in a rundown bureaucracy. Two astronauts, who are not very smart, make their way with shady dealings, smuggling and spaceship wrecking.
title: Der große Verhau
plot_es: Outer space in 2034 is run by greedy corporations in a rundown bureaucracy. Two astronauts, who are not very smart, make their way with shady dealings, smuggling and spaceship wrecking.
plot_en: Outer space in 2034 is run by greedy corporations in a rundown bureaucracy. Two astronauts, who are not very smart, make their way with shady dealings, smuggling and spaceship wrecking.

cast.role: Inhaberin der Firma Joint Galactic Transports
cast.name: Henrike Fürst

cast.role: Leiter der Bodenstation der Firma Joint Galactic Transports
cast.name: Hayo von Zündt
